Mental System: Ears (Know Lead): bonus to acoustic detection
Eyes (Aware Lead): bonus to night vision
Nerves (Intuit Lead): bonus to reaction timing
Emotion (Charm Lead): bonus to social insight
Jaws (Will Lead): bonus to bite strength
Absorbing (Might Lead): Reduces incoming blunt damage or knockback.
Agility (Reflex Lead): Bonus to defense rolls or evasion when moving.
Cardio (Endure Lead): Increases max Stamina pool or recovery rate.
Dexterity (Finesse Lead): Bonus to escaping grapples or avoiding traps.
Regenerative (Vitality Lead): Regain HP/Meat during rests or at the start of turns.
Resistant (Fortitude Lead): Bonus to resisting poison
Manipulative (Know Lead): Interacting with complex items
Sensitive (Aware Lead): Detecting hidden objects by touch or gaining advantage on aim.
Autonomous (Intuit Lead): Reflexive parries or automatic counter-attacks.
Steadfast (Will Lead): grappling or holding  or withstanding force.
Sturdy (Endure Lead): Marching through difficult terrain without slowing down.
Resistant (Fortitude Lead): Rooting in place or ignoring floor hazards (lava/spikes).
Hard (Might Lead): Grants natural armor DB or reduces slashing damage.
Slick (Reflex Lead): Makes you harder to grapple or causes ranged attacks to slip off.
Fur (Endure Lead): Protection against cold or storage of static energy.
Elastic (Finesse Lead): Bonus to stealth or squeezed movement through gaps.
Fatty (Vitality Lead): Storage of energy (Focus/Stamina) or protection from hunger.
Adaptive (Fortitude Lead): Changes color/texture to match the environment (Camo).
